trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> class defines a handler delegate for two events that occur on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control: the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event.

The method that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method.

The method that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> method.
In both cases, the event data are contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> object.
